alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 3:00AM CDT until June 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Southwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 259 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Bratt to 3 miles east of Loxley to 5 miles east of Alabama Port to 9 miles west of Dauphin Island, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Fairhope, Gonzalez, Gulf Shores, Foley, Pace, Gulf Breeze, Orange Beach, Goulding, Robertsdale, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Loxley, Lillian and Myrtle Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
